questions.prompt: You're studying for an exam and find yourself getting distracted easily. What do you thing is the cause?

answers.text: Anything social media, working to long on small tasks, not knowing how to start. I get distracted easily
I keep checking my phone and social media, wasting valuable study time.
I am always hungry or feeling tired.

answers.text: Never
Rarely
Sometimes
Often

questions.prompt: You're feeling tired and sluggish during the day. What's your typical response?

answers.text: I push through the fatigue with unhealthy snacks and caffeine.
I try to power through my schedule despite feeling tired.
I know I should take a walk or a nap...

questions.prompt: You are at the end of the semester: What situation can you identify with the most?

answers.text: I get overwehlemed by all the things I have to do.
All I do is study, while coffeein and sweets keep me going.
Exams are always a very tough time, because I do not know where to start.
All I do is study, sleep and eat.

questions.prompt: You're feeling overwhelmed with schoolwork and extracurricular activities. What do you do first?

answers.text: I will comfort eat, watch a series/play some games to distract me, go to a party all night.
I bottle up my feelings and try to power through everything, feeling increasingly stressed and anxious.
I try to do everything at once, feeling scattered and unproductive.
I struggle to concentrate on any task due to feeling overwhelmed.

questions.prompt: You have a big presentation to prepare. How do you plan to do it?

answers.text: I do not really plan. I do it when I find time for it.
I set it on my To-Do List, but I probably won't start befor it's almost to late.
I make some slides real quick and talk through them during the presentation.

questions.prompt: It's the weekend, and you have a free day. How do you typically spend it?

answers.text: I spend most of the day catching up on schoolwork, feeling constantly pressured to be productive.
I try to fit in all the errands and social activities I neglected during the week, feeling overwhelmed by the to-do list.
I struggle to disconnect from schoolwork and find it hard to relax and enjoy my free time.
I know I should do some workout, or go outside, but I always have a hard time motivating myself.

questions.prompt: If you could change something in your life. What of the following statements do you agree with the most?

answers.text: Working out more, eating better.
Feeling less anxious, and more confident.
Knowing what is important.
